name: Raindrops Keep Fallin' on My Plants!
name_original: Raindrops Keep Fallin' on My Plants!
description:
The mini game based around taking care of cacti in the middle of a rainstorm , build for GBJAM 5 (2016).

If you like the art, go and check out our artist's deviant art : http://cocoroll.deviantart.com/

Written in Java with LibGDX. We really hate you <3

Chiptune & SFX Created with : http://www.beepbox.co/

Palette Used:

  • #97b91a
  • #749b22
  • #3a6a2e
  • #0d370f
Made by Five Leaf Clover Studio 2016
